institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Continuing employment incentive payment and operating rules/Article 7 (document supplementation, etc.)
contents: Article 7 (Supplementation of Documents, etc.) ① If the documents submitted by the payment applicant do not meet the requirements or the review in accordance with Article 6 is not possible with the documents alone, the Chairman shall specify the supplementary matters and other necessary matters and supplement them within 15 days. ② If the applicant for payment does not submit supplementary documents within the period specified in Paragraph 1, the Chairman may request supplementation again by granting a period of up to 7 days from the expiration date of the period. ③ The Chairman may request the applicant again for supplementation. A. If the application under Article 5 is not submitted within the designated period according to the plan under Article 4, the incentive may not be paid as it is considered that there is no intention to apply. In the following cases, despite the fact that the payment applicant has no intention to apply for the incentive, the incentive may not be paid. 1. The location of the payment applicant is unknown or the mail has been sent twice due to refusal to receive the incentive. 2. If the payment applicant did not submit supplementary documents within the period specified in Paragraph 1 or 2.
